text: @DineshDSouza I'm curious if these are actually COVID-19 photos. Those are very heavy down coats to be wearing in June... and COVID-19 at best started mid-March, except we were quarantined for another 8 weeks... Regardless, the police officer does not deserve this kind of abuse, even at $240K.
